documentContentReferences.name: Screening Site Procedures Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from a footnote in the Schedule of Activities (Table 1) to Section 8 for details on procedures specific to US screening sites.

documentContentReferences.name: COVID-19 Vaccine Risk Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 2.3.1.1 to Section 10.5 regarding potential risks and mitigation measures for the COVID-19 vaccine.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Reference from Risk Table
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 3 (Potential Risks and Mitigation Strategy) to Section 6.6 for dose modification or discontinuation procedures.

documentContentReferences.name: Adaptive Features Table Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 4.1 to Table 4, which describes the adaptive design features of the study.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Criteria Table Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: ALXN1840 Dose Modifications for Individual Participants
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Table 4 (Adaptive Protocol Features) to Table 7 for specific dose modification criteria.

documentContentReferences.name: Blood Donation Exclusion Criteria Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from lifestyle considerations (Table 5) to Section 5.2 regarding blood donation restrictions.

documentContentReferences.name: Contraception Guidance Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Contraceptive Guidance and Collection of Pregnancy Information
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from lifestyle considerations (Table 5) to Section 10.4 for details on appropriate contraceptive methods.

documentContentReferences.name: Contraception Start Time Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from lifestyle considerations (Table 5) to Section 5.1 for contraception start time requirements.

documentContentReferences.name: Discontinuation Data Collection Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 to the Schedule of Activities for data to be collected upon discontinuation of study intervention.

documentContentReferences.name: Discontinuation for Liver Function Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 to Section 6.6 for dose modification criteria related to abnormal liver function.

documentContentReferences.name: Discontinuation for Pregnancy Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 to Section 8.2.6 regarding discontinuation due to pregnancy.

documentContentReferences.name: Participant Withdrawal Data Collection Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.2 to the Schedule of Activities for data to be collected at the time of participant withdrawal.

documentContentReferences.name: ECG Withdrawal Criteria Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: DISCONTINUATION OF STUDY INTERVENTION AND PARTICIPANT DISCONTINUATION/WITHDRAWAL
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.2.3 to Section 7 for QTc withdrawal criteria.

documentContentReferences.name: Clinical Laboratory Tests List Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.2.4 to Section 10.2 for the list of clinical laboratory tests to be performed.

documentContentReferences.name: AE/SAE Procedures Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Adverse Events: Definitions and Procedures for Recording, Evaluating, Follow-up, and Reporting
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3 to Section 10.3 for procedures on recording, evaluating, and reporting AEs and SAEs.

documentContentReferences.name: Lost to Follow-up Definition Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3.3 to Section 7.3 for the definition of lost to follow-up.

documentContentReferences.name: Genetic Testing Prohibition Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3.6 to Section 8.7, confirming that biobanked samples will not be used for genetic testing.

documentContentReferences.name: Molybdenum Measurement Details Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.5 to Section 8.1.1 for details of molybdenum measurement in food, drinks, urine, and feces.

documentContentReferences.name: Biomarker Details Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.8 to Section 8.6 for details on specific biomarkers.

documentContentReferences.name: Analysis Populations Table Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 9.3 to Table 8, which defines the populations for analyses.

documentContentReferences.name: ECG Schedule Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 9.4.3 to the Schedule of Activities (Table 1) for ECG measurement time points.

commentAnnotations.text: Abbreviations: ALT = alanine aminotransferase; AST = aspartate aminotransferase; IB = Investigatorâ€™s Brochure; PK = pharmacokinetics; WD = Wilson disease.
commentAnnotations.sourceSection: Table 3: Potential Risks and Mitigation Strategy

commentAnnotations.text: Abbreviations: CRF = case report form; CRU = clinical research unit; EOS = End of Study; SoA = Schedule of Activities.
Abbreviations: ICF = informed consent form; PD = pharmacodynamic; PK = pharmacokinetic.

Note: total molybdenum and PUF molybdenum concentration-time profiles on Day 28 after the last 15 mg ALXN1840 dose will be extrapolated to Day 29 (0-24 hr) and subtracted from the observed Day 29 concentration-time profiles after the first 30 mg
